mapper.select: SELECT a.qr_id AS qrId, a.user_no AS userNo, a.check_time AS checkTime, u.no AS userNo, u.id AS userId, u.name AS userName, u.email AS userEmail, u.phone AS userPhone FROM attendance a INNER JOIN users u ON a.user_no = u.no WHERE (u.id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR u.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR u.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
